extendedInfo.description: Easily track expense on a vehicle, including mileage and other expenses. Get simple but useful reports / history like trip wise, fuel fill-up wise and total expense as of now.Features. Manage multiple vehicles. No limit. Record Trips, Fill-ups, and Other expenses like car wash,   parts etc. Automatic start odo. Auto return trip. Favorite trips for less data entry. (Long tap on favs button). Categorize trips into Private/Business . Additional notes can be saved with each records.. Install and run from SD card (Android 2.2 and above). Simple reports and statistics. Backup / Restore Database. And it's completely freeSystem Requirements. Android 1.6 and abovePlease send your valuable comments and suggestions to our email id : ccsmts@gmail.com. Your suggestions will make this app more useful.Keywords : Mileage Tracker, Expense Tracker, Fuel Logs, Car Manager, Free Mileage Log

reviews.title: Data Error
reviews.comment: Unless I\'m having a \'senior moment\', the MPG isn\'t being figured on input data from THIS fill up, but from the previous fill up. The last entry should be showing the mileage and the distance driven since LAST fill up. For that reason alone, it\'s basically worthless and doesn\'t deserve the star I gave it.
reviews.author: Skip Bradley

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: This is a good app but two things are annoying.  1 the size when typing  odometer number  is too small   2. the selection bar should be removed  when typing. This takes up valuable real estate on small devices and you cannot see what you are typing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor planning
reviews.comment: Developer\'s email not working. Trip log only calculates from the last fillup, so if you have to get fuel 300 miles into a 400 mile trip it tells you your trip was only 100 miles.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No ability to export data limits usefulness. Now after 11 months it has just stopped working. What a waste.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t calculate mpg correctly
reviews.comment: Does not calculate mpg correctly. I knew the numbers didn\'t look right and confirmed it by dumping them into excel for calculations. I can\'t figure out how this app comes with the numbers it does.
reviews.author: Scott Eaves

reviews.comment: Always force close crap app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very usefully app
reviews.comment: Keep it up guys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Reporting
reviews.comment: Had to input gas. Would not let you more on. The reports did not gave you a detail report. Those app sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a good app. It remembers the previous log entry, which is good. The favorites feature is nice, but doesn\'t allow edits yet. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but useful
reviews.comment: an easy to use apps that can be used to manage all the expenses related to your vehicle. The trip wise history is really useful especially when you can get business/personal use separated. I started using it and it does its job great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too difficult to use
reviews.comment: Allows you to create reports, but doesn\'t have a feature to email that report. Hard to figure out how to set the defaults.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dev\'s server not accepting email . Beginning mileage should be allowed at the start of a trip without having to enter ending mileage until trip ends
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t do math
reviews.comment: Somehow it got the math wrong. Terrible app. Evo 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helps when you itemize
reviews.comment: Good so far!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cody
reviews.comment: Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app, but total fuel cost is wrong
reviews.comment: Total Fuel Cost is being shown wrongly.  Have added fuel of 80 Rupees and 100 Rupees, but total cost says 358. Developer please fix this ASAP
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mr
reviews.comment: Great job guys, I have tested a few mileage app now and this is the best one thus far. Note: The \"add this to favourites\" should be automatic and you should be able to create or edit a list of Favourites in settings somewhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t do basic math. Need to calculate mpg based on the current fillup, not previous one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful app
reviews.comment: It can\'t even do basic math.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too restrictive
reviews.comment: Would not let me save trip until i told it i filled up tank.
reviews.author: joel freedman
